abstract: A conjecture of Ulam states that the standard probability measure π on the Hilbert cube Iω is invariant under the induced metric da provided the sequence a={ai} of positive numbers satisfies the condition ∑i=1∞ai2<∞. In this paper, we prove this conjecture in the affirmative. More precisely, we prove that if there exists a surjective da-isometry f:E1→E2, where E1 and E2 are Borel subsets of Iω, then π(E1)=π(E2).

br0030.title: On the conjecture of ulam on the invariance of measure in the hilbert cube
